title: Centre seeks ARAI comments on plaints against Ola Electric
description: The Centre has sought ARAI's comments on consumer complaints against Ola Electric, ensuring compliance with FAME and PM E-DRIVE guidelines. The complaints have led to a Show Cause Notice from CCPA. Ola Electric claims the notice does not impact its operations or financials.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
